original_text: They will eat all the crops in your fields and the food that you have stored. They will take your sons and your daughters for themselves. They will kill your sheep and your cows for food. They will eat all your grapes and your figs. They will attack your strong cities where you thought you would be safe. Their soldiers will knock down the walls.’ They will eat all the crops in your fields
korean_text: 그들이 네 자녀들이 먹을 추수 곡물과 양식을 먹으며 네 양 떼와 소 떼를 먹으며 네 포도나무와 무화과나무 열매를 먹으며 네가 믿는 견고한 성들을 칼로 파멸하리라

sentences.original_text: They will eat all the crops in your fields
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 네 밭의 모든 곡식을 먹을 것이다

sentences.original_text: and the food that you have stored
They will take your sons and your daughters
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 네 아들들과 딸들을 데려갈 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will kill your sheep and your cows
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 네 양과 소를 죽일 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will eat all your grapes
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 네 모든 포도를 먹을 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will attack your strong cities
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 네 견고한 성들을 공격할 것이다

sentences.original_text: where you thought you would be safe
Their soldiers will knock down the walls
